page.title: Adverbs and AdvP - Reason Adverbs
page.introduction: Reason adverbs include therefore and so. Reason can also be expressed by a prepositional phrase for this reason and by an adverbial clause beginning with because. Reason adverbs do not allow modifiers (at least in English).

form.instruction: In the lexicon, key the feature reason on all adverbs that express reason, and also on the nouns like reason and purpose.
